Mercedes Benz

Mercedes Me Mobile App

Mobility + safety are reinvented with Mercedes Me Collision Guardian.

In 1886, with the first car. Now it’s time to do so again. Mobility these days is far more than simply a means of transport. A whole world is open to you now on your smartphone.

The world of Mercedes-Benz, too. Check your vehicle’s data, take a look at your contracts or book your personal mobility services. So much is possible – and every day there’s more. So come aboard and join us on a journey into the future of mobility.

“Work on this project was more than a simple job… I’m a big fan of cars, and Mercedes Benz is one of the most incredible brands in the world. Mercedes Benz not just build awesome cars, but they are one step ahead in therms of innovation and safety.”

Guilherme Ferreira

UX Designer
Getting touch

We’re looking forward to hear from you!

Let’s discover the behaviors, motivations and needs of your customers through observation, task analysis and other types of user feedback.
